params._randomWord: The random value answering the request.

params._callbackGasLimit: The limit for how much gas to use for the callback request to the contract's fulfillRandomWords() function.
params._consumer: The address that can request random numbers.
params._keyHash: The gas lane key hash value - Defines the maximum gas price you are willing to pay for a request in wei (ID of the off-chain VRF job).
params._requestConfirmations: How many confirmations the Chainlink node should wait before responding.
params._subscriptionId: The unique identifier of the subscription used for funding requests.
params._vrfCoordinator: The address of the VRFCoordinator contract.

returns.randomNumber: The random number or 0 if it is not ready or has not been requested.

requestRandomness().details: Ensure that the subscription is set and funded.Consumer only.

devdoc.title: Random Number Generator that uses Chainlink VRF v2.5

RequestFulfilled(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a request has been fulfilled.

RequestSent(uint256).notice: Emitted when a request is sent to the VRF Coordinator

changeCallbackGasLimit(uint32).notice: Changes the callback gas limit of the contract.

changeConsumer(address).notice: Changes the consumer of the RNG.

changeKeyHash(bytes32).notice: Changes the key hash of the contract.

changeOwner(address).notice: Changes the owner of the contract.

changeRequestConfirmations(uint16).notice: Changes the request confirmations of the contract.

changeSubscriptionId(uint256).notice: Changes the subscription ID of the contract.

changeVrfCoordinator(address).notice: Changes the VRF Coordinator of the contract.

constructor.notice: Constructor, initializing the implementation to reduce attack surface.

setCoordinator(address).notice: Sets the VRF Coordinator addressThis method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner
